text: Gaetano "Gay" Talese (; born February 7, 1932) is an American writer and journalist. He was a journalist for The New York Times and Esquire magazine during the 1960s. Talese's most famous articles are about Joe DiMaggio and Frank Sinatra. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:Journalists from New York City Category:People from Ocean City, New Jersey
title: Gay Talese
